credit_line: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: The Watermelon Boys
provenance: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
medium: Brush and oil paint on canvas
description: Horizontal view showing in foreground, three boys,( two african-american,one caucasion) eating slices cut from a watermelon that lies before them. On right  a broad wooden fence recedes into the meadow behind them and on left low tress and bushes fill the distance. A blue range of hills crosses the extreme background below a partially clouded sky.
name: Painting
